name: Yellow Snake. Hunt
description:
Yellow snake hunts mice that live in burrows and go out to eat nuts. Mice run away when they see a snake. Snake can sneak up on the mouse back or hide from them behind some obstacle.

But the snake is also not safe. Behind him hunt hawks. From birds to hide in dense thickets.

To start the movement need to poke a finger in the wheel and, without lifting your finger from the screen, move it in the direction in which it is necessary to move the snake. Move your finger around the center of the wheel will rotate the snake in the same direction. Have a good game!
